mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.doctor_name, d.hospital_id, d.dept_id, d.title, d.specialty, d.academic_background, d.schedule_time, d.consultation_fee, d.rating, d.review_count, d.is_deleted, d.create_time, d.update_time, h.hospital_name, dept.dept_name FROM doctor_info d LEFT JOIN hospital_info h ON d.hospital_id = h.id AND h.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN hospital_department dept ON d.dept_id = dept.id AND dept.is_deleted = 0 WHERE d.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY d.rating DESC, d.review_count DESC
